name: Stealth Assasin Game Entry (To Be Updated)
name_original: Stealth Assasin Game Entry (To Be Updated)
description:
The goal is to reach and interact with the beast as well as exploring the map for any and all secrets. (The beast is a green mutant and not a humanoid figure.) I had included that in my game however, the software would not let me save it so I wound up only being able to provide this:

Keep in mind this game is not 100% done and it is for the June Game Jam. Anyways good luck everyone hope you have fun.
